title: Brand AFKing after 3 mins in ranked leaving me to lose -20 LP due to team giving up.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So i just played a game where i had a team mate clearly having no problems die in lane at level 3 then instantly AFK.
Because the timer was after 3 mins we couldn't remake as such so i had to play out the game where my team had given up. I'm only posting this here because I'm not even allowed to create a ticket relating to something of the sort.  I play on the OCE server at a silver level and i don't expect things like "loss Prevented" to exist but i still think i should get some redemption for having to lose 20 LP FREELY.

Due to Naming and Shaming rules i can't show the name of the player and submit it to tickets because they don't allow it.

If somebody would be to as kindly contact me in anyway to tell me if i could deal with this problem or a resolution. 

Thanks
- Swane

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best course of action in cases such as these is to use the ingame report feature on the end of game screen.
Also, i know this seems stupid with S7 coming up relatively soon but i'm slowly getting sick and tired of this common trend affecting me weekly and there seems to be no FIX yet. Which is pathetic.
